## EventHandlerDefinition interface

Definitions for event handlers.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface EventHandlerDefinition<H extends string, P> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [eventHandlerName](./webshell.eventhandlerdefinition.eventhandlername.md) | H | The name of the event handler. A naming convention is <code>onDOM</code> + PascalCase event name, to avoid any collision with WebView's own props. |
|  [payloadType](./webshell.eventhandlerdefinition.payloadtype.md) | P | Placeholder value to infer P. |
